mapper.insert: INSERT INTO security.communityboard (writer, title, content, regdate, viewCnt, commentCnt) VALUES (#{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{registerDate}, #{viewCnt}, #{commentCnt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM security.communityboard WHERE deleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY board_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT * FROM security.communityboard WHERE deleteDate IS NULL AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') ORDER BY regdate DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT * FROM security.communityboard WHERE deleteDate IS NULL AND writer LIKE CONCAT('%' #{writer}, '%') ORDER BY regdate DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM security.communityboard WHERE deleteDate IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM security.communityboard WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM security.communityboard WHERE writer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{writer}, '%')
